title: BIG FACTS feat. MYKKO MONTANA + HUNXHO
itunes:title: BIG FACTS feat. MYKKO MONTANA + HUNXHO
description:
On this double segment episode, Mykko Montana talks hiatus, new music, past record business issues, Yung Joc, Nitti Beatz and more. 
 
Hunxho also stops by BIG FACTS to speak on his hit record "Lets Get It", adjusting to the music game and more!

Visit:

www.bigfactspod.com

|

For Merch:

bigfactsmerch.myshopify.com

|

Follow:

@BigFactsPod
